item.title: Graduate level Econometrics
item.description: I have been fearful of econometrics since the first lesson in college. Admittedly, it was among the hardest courses and terms like “asymptotic” and “parametric” were just too abstract. After taking two versions of this course from different institutions and being the teaching assistant for four instructors that taught this course, I would say that I have climbed up on the spiraling ladder of learning enough to be no longer scared of it.
